errors.missingBaseApp: The base application is unknown or as a restricted access.
errors.brokenHTML: HTML structure is broken, expect html, head and body elements
errors.noAppAtUrl: The page at URL {{url}} doesn't seem to host an application compatible with this service.
errors.missingDataset: The dataset {{id}} is unknown or does not belong to you
errors.extensionShortIdConflict: The dataset contains 2 extensions that have a conflict on the prefix of the extended columns.
errors.badContentType: This API expects a compatible content-type header, most often application/json
errors.exceedLimitIndexed: You exceeded your indexed data storage limit.
errors.exceedLimitNbDatasets: You exceeded your number of datasets limit.
errors.missingPermission: You don't have the permission to perform this action.
errors.exceedRateLimiting: Too much requests in a small time interval for this API.
errors.exceedAnonymousRateLimiting: Trop many messages in a short interval. Please wait and try again.
errors.looksLikeSpam: Message rejected, activity looks like a spam robot.
errors.noCrossDomain: Request from an other domain not supported.
errors.urlFriendly: "{{value}}" should be more URL friendly, maybe you could use "{{slug}}" ?

appRequire.noDataset: does not use a dataset as source.

dataset-created.title: New dataset {label}
dataset-created.body: The new dataset {label} was just created.
